title: Color and Pray Healing Journal: 100+ page Adult Coloring Journal Book
features: Color and Pray Healing Journal - A 132 page healing coloring book of unique mandalas, zentangles and images to color, and pages to journal as you reflect on God's Word. Bible Verses Coloring BookPerfect with gel pens and colored pencils. Coloring with Sharpies will give amazing coverage, but will show through to backside of pages. Christian coloring book for adults with bible scriptures/quotes that focuses on healing, to help you spend time in the presence of God, meditate on his Words and enjoy yourself in relaxation while you color inspirational verses. Increase your faith while creating art. Journaling pages allow you to capture your prayers and thoughts, the words God may speak to you in your time of meditation, or use the pages for a planner. Includes pages for journaling your thoughts and prayers. Perfect with coloring pencils, pens or markers. Enjoyable for men, women and children. Excellent for healing gifts and devotional time!Look for our other Bible adult coloring book journals in the Color and Pray Journaling Books series. Gratefulness journal.Other titles in the series: Color and Pray Love Journal8.5" x 11" bound coloring book; Gel pen coloring book
description: Kissed Publications and Literary Agency, founded in 2003 by Kimberly T. Millionaire, (formerly Kimberly T. Matthews) represents and e-publishes African-American mainstream fiction, Christian fiction and inspirational non-fiction works, consistently building productive working relationships with editors that help us advise you and guide your work toward the most appropriate markets. Our main focus is to represent literary fiction and non-fiction books for adults. We digitally and physically publish works, encompassing acquisition, copyediting, graphic design, production, printing, sales marketing and distributing on electronic platforms. Visit our website at www.KPLAPublishing.com.
